The idea behind The Magic Box is to bring an entertaining and dynamic mean to learn about the virtues that should identify us as society to the general public.

    Victor Aguirre Virtuesores--> Love: Love is when I show by several ways my interest, care and affection to other people and my surroundings.

Love is one of the most sincere ways of affection towards others! Peace: Peace is when I live in harmony, respect and tranquility with others.

We can pass the peace to others! Respect: Respect is when I appreciate and accept everyone else\' opinions, actions and qualities.

I respect myself and others! Solidarity: Solidarity is when I help those who needs to and I\'m generous with them without expecting anything in return.

If We act as a team, We can achieve and build great things! Diversity: Diversity is when I share and get along with other people regardless of their gender, religion, ethnicity, culture, likings or social status.

Let\'s learn from diversity, We are all different! Inclusiveness / Equality: Inclusiveness is when I share and encourage everyone as equals to get involved with their skills.

Let\'s all enjoy our rights! Everyone is equal! Empathy: Empathy is when I put myself in place of others to understand their emotions, feelings and needs.

Empathy helps us to care for others! Freedom: Freedom is when I think and act by my own will and interest, as long as I respect the rules, the limits and right of others.

Let\'s express ourselves freely! It\'s our right! Responsibility: Responsibility means to compromise and to do my duties and actions.

With responsibility We achieve success! Honesty: Honesty is when I think, act and express myself being true to myself and to others.

Honesty is the door to a healty coexistence! Skate Park
We develop and enable spaces to dialogue and encounter for personal growth and the improvement of teenagers and young adults\' capabilities.
La Libertad Park Foundation
The La Libertad Park is a project of human welfare and social inclusiveness that aims to improve the surrounding communities\' quality of life by economy, social and environmental development.
CTVA - Center of Technology and Visual Arts
In the CTVA We strive to encourage human development and the formation of young people by means of technical specialization.
La Libertad Auditorium
The La Libertad Auditorium is a place to gather the surrounding populations to artistic and cultural expressions.
School of Dance, Theater and Circus
We at the School of Dance, Theater and Circus have the purpose of teaching children, teenagers and young people to give their best as high-quality performers and producers in theater, dance and circus acts, bringing important contributions to local and national culture.
Fairground
It is a place to perform cultural and recreational activities, such as dancing, concerts, fairs and many more.
